description: This file contains the main UI components of a notes app built with Jetpack Compose, including navigation, screens for listing, editing, and creating notes, as well as UI elements like search bar, list items, and action buttons.

methods.name: NotesApp
methods.description: Sets up the navigation graph with two main destinations: main list and edit note screens.

methods.name: MainScreen
methods.description: Displays list of notes with search functionality, add button, and handles navigation to editing.

methods.name: NoteListItem
methods.description: UI component for displaying individual note summaries with options to edit or delete.

methods.name: EditNoteScreen
methods.description: Screen for creating or editing a note, with validation and save logic.
